DOC.brief_summary: The objective study evaluate safety efficacy Acclarent Tympanostomy Tube Delivery System ( TTDS ) placement tympanostomy tube ( TTs ) patient indicate treatment chronic otitis medium effusion ( OME ) recurrent acute otitis medium ( AOM ) .
DOC.brief_title: Singapore Tympanostomy Tube Delivery System Study
DOC.criteria: 1 . > = 1 year age 2 . Diagnosed either Chronic Otitis Media Effusion recurrent Acute Otitis Media schedule undergo bilateral unilateral tympanostomy tube insertion . 3 . Either male female 1 . History sensitivity reaction anaesthesia 2 . Markedly atrophic , retract , atelectatic perforate tympanic membrane . 3 . Otitis externa 4 . Active acute otitis medium 5 . Thickened Tympanic Membrane 6 . Thick mucoid effusion ( also know `` glue ear '' ) 7 . Otitis medium pathology require Ttubes
